name: Drag & Drop Sandwich Shop
description:
Making sandwiches isn’t so easy in this game.

Probably relaxing. But probably boring & repetitive too just like making sandwiches in real life.

Only those who can endure the difficulty (and the boredom) can be successful (and unlock the final form of the shop)!

How to Play

Make sandwiches by dragging & dropping the ingredients to the tray.

Sandwiches can be arranged in any way you want but the ingredients must be enclosed by 2 slices of bread.

Tips

Things might get easier as you get used to the 3D physics.

Be the best in sandwich making!

Compete with others and participate in leaderboards in the Android version.
